c74object.name: fftz.cavoc~
c74object.description: Spectra are generated by an 8-rule cellular automaton.

method.name: bang
method.description: Trigger a new spectrum when external_trigger flag is set.

method.name: bottomfreq
method.description: Set the lowest frequency to synthesize (oscillator bank resynthesis only).

method.name: external_trigger
method.description: Non-zero argument turns on flag. Then each new spectrum must be triggered manually with a bang.

method.name: fftinfo
method.description: Print FFT information to Max window.

method.name: retune
method.description: Retunes the spectrum (oscillator bank resynthesis only).

method.name: rule
method.description: A list of eight integers (each valued 0 or 1) defines the CA rule.

method.name: topfreq
method.description: Set the highest frequency to synthesize (oscillator bank resynthesis only).

attribute.name: density
attribute.description: Density of bins with energy in the starting spectrum. Valid values are between 0-1.

attribute.name: holdtime
attribute.description: Time in milliseconds between spectral updates
